description.content:
Welcome to Expert Wix Website Design & Development!


Are you in need of a Wix wizard? Look no further! With 7 years of expertise, I specialize in crafting captivating, responsive, and SEO-friendly websites on Wix.


Why Choose Me?

  • 7 Years of Experience
  • 30 Days Free Support
  • Satisfaction Guarantee
  • Pixel-Perfect Designs
  • Fast Delivery and Friendly Support
  • Certified UI/UX Designer
  • 1400+ Five-Star Reviews:



What I Offer:

  • Responsive Design
  • SEO Optimization
  • Beautiful Color Schemes:


Tools I Use:

  • Figma for UI UX design
  • Wix for Development

(I can work with Webfow, Framer, Wordpress etc as well)



Ready to take your online presence to new heights? Click "CONTACT SELLER" to discuss your project requirements. Let's turn your Wix website dreams into reality!

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need to start the project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
I will need login details for your Wix account.
Also, Please share the logo/Branding details, Content for the website, and any inspirational/competitor's websites that you have.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you also Design Websites in "Wix Studio" ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Currently We are only providing our services in Designing websites using " Classic Wix Editor" which is very user-friendly & Easy to handle by any Client.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you use Webflow or Framer to build my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I provide development services using other platforms including HTML CSS, Wordpress, Webflow, Framer, Builder.io etc.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I update the website content later?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Sure, updating your website is simple. It comes with a user-friendly admin panel that lets you edit content with ease. You'll have full control to make changes whenever you need to.

openGraph.title: do wix website design, redesign and development

reviews.comment: The delivery was not on time, and a significantly higher fee was requested to complete just one page. There was a lot of back-and-forth communication, and the deadline was not met. While the design skills are undoubtedly good, the delivery time and communication professionalism left much to be desired. Additionally, he frequently referred to me as "brother," which made me feel uncomfortable.

seller_response.comment:
Due to a lot of feedback and multiply revision different from the initial order requirements it took 2 extra days to complete design and live site.
'' Client was satisfied with our design and development as he already mentioned in the comment "" 

We informed the client about the new page fee before starting, and it was their choice to proceed, which they did and again we did an amazing work for second page also.

reviews.comment:
Brilliant wix website design.

Would definitely recommend Sumit.

Very creative and quick to respond.

Brian
Great work from Sumit, highly responsive
It was very good working with Sumit!

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback. I understand that the work was delayed as we switched the development method. I really appreciate your flexibility to make sure that everything is done properly with 100% satisfaction. I highly appreciate your professionalism thought-out the process.

notableClients.name: MyHeritage
notableClients.interaction_description: We're doing custom ReactJS development for MyHeritage internal projects. We've planned, created mockups and prepared High Fidelity Designs for multiple processes. Our project manager is very happy with the work and offered us many future contracts.

enriched_details.name: MyHeritage
enriched_details.description: Create your family tree. Take a MyHeritage DNA test for ancestry and genetic testing. Access 14.1 billion historical records for genealogy research.

notableClients.name: Fiverr
notableClients.interaction_description: We are working with Fiverr Development Team to research, plan, and strategise for various feature over Fiverr Marketplace. We're working on Figma mockups, APIs and CMS  to create pixel perfect UI and digital experiences for users.

enriched_details.name: Fiverr
enriched_details.description: Fiverr's mission is to change how the world works together. Fiverr connects businesses with freelancers offering digital services in 300+ categories.

consultationData.description:
In this consultation call, we will figure out what you're looking for and how I might help. I will share my suggestions to achieve the result. 

At last, I'll share a detailed plan to move forward!
